title: Close Combat 5 Invasion Normandy - Ardennes Offensive v1.03 Mod
description:
This mod originally seeded by by http://www.closecombatseries.net

Name: Ardennes Offensive
For: Close Combat 5 - Invasion Normandy
Version: 1.01
By: Nomada_Firefox

Description: This mod recreates the battle in the Ardennes similar to that of Battle Of The Bulge. Nimits' TrueGreen mod for CC4 has been inserted into this mod. The entire game has been overhauled and is essentially CC4.

Installation: 1. Full installation of Close Combat 5 Invasion Normandy required. (Not included)
2. Install CC5_Patch_v5.01a.exe (Included)
3. Install Cfg13.zip (This is the Config Manager used to install mods - included)
4. Unzip CC5_ArdennesOffensive_Mappack.zip to C:/Program Files/SSI/Close Combat Invasion Normandy/Maps or equivalent folder.
5. Unzip CC5_ArdennesOffensive1.03.zip to C:/Config Manager/Plugins or equivalent.
6. Run the Config Manager and install CC5Ardennes1.02.
7. Play CC5


Notes: The following submods are optional... 
CC5AO1.03TB - Trueblack submod 
CC5AO103VG - Volkgrenadier submod 
CC5AOFullC - Full Command submod 
CC5AOTGTanks103 - truegreen Vehicles submod

For additional info, patches, how to guides and updates for this mod and all others visit http://www.closecombatseries.net. To play online install the included GameSpy Arcade client (ArcadeInstallFull205-google.exe) and join the Close Combat 5 Invasion Normandy Room.
